summary: This mod includes two recolors of the Light Elven Armor by newermind43. There are two separate colors to choose from: purple, and grey. This is not a standalone mod, so you will only be able to use one of the retextures.
descriptionHtml:
Light Elven Armor recolors by CrimsonFairy

NOTE: This mod is just a texture replacer, and only contains the textures! You still need the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34074]original mod[/url].

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Description
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
This mod includes two recolors of the Light Elven Armor by newermind43. There are two separate colors to choose from: purple, and grey. This is not a standalone mod, so you will only be able to use one of the retextures. Colors may be brighter, darker, more or less saturated depending on what graphic enhancers or ENBs you use.

Initially, this mod was supposed to just be for my character, but I decided to share it with the community since the recolors turned out okay. :)

I won't be making any more recolors for this set, so please do not request any. This was going to just be a personal mod, I didn't even intend to release these, but I hope you all like the ones I am releasing.

Please do not ask me to make a standalone version, because I don't have permission or the time to make one.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Requirements
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Just the original mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34074]here[/url].

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Install/Uninstall
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Extract files from archive into Skryim data folder. Click yes to all, and when asked to overwrite anything say yes. And that's it!

Go to Data/Textures/armor/LightElvenArmor and delete Dress_tex, Parts_tex, and Boot_Glove. Or just overwrite the textures with the original ones.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Credits
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
newermind43 for making the original armor and for letting me retexture it.
And the Nexus creators and staff for their awesome work and website.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Usage/Permission
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
You are not allowed to do anything with this mod without proper permission from newermind43 and me.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Bugs/incompatibilities
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Will be incompatible with any other mods that replace the Light Elven Armor textures. No bugs that I know of. Please let me know if you find any!
author: CrimsonFairy
